const ShareModal = (props) => { const { title, setActionValue, setModal , user , SetUser} = props const onClickHandler = () => { SetUser(user) console.log(user+"mod") setActionValue(true) setModal(false) } return (
​

{title}

SetUser(e.target.value)} placeholder="Write username here...">
) } export default ShareModal;
